name: Kitchen Runner
description:
Controls:

Arrows keys to move

ENTER to interact with stations

What is Kitchen Runner?

The player has to keep customers satisfied while also making sure the kitchen is operating smoothly. If the player fails to do their objectives, they’ll earn a strike, and once they’ve earned three strikes the game is over. Essentially the main goal is to see how long the player can last and how much money they can make before they inevitably lose.
